name: Kryptic
description:
You've just received a mysterious program from a friend of yours, claiming to have secret information. Bad news is that they've been traced, so they're forced to encode the information, and send it to you. Are you up to the challenge?

This puzzle game filled with codes and ciphers will test your logical thinking and reasoning. Don't worry if you're having some difficulty, there's a hint system included for those who have difficulty, and there are 7 included cipher tools to make things easier.

To see the development log of this game, go to my website
